sentence.Network_en: I had another spontaneous miscarriage at around the 16th to 18th week.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在大约第16至18孕周时又经历了一次自然流产。
一片自然迸发的赞美声

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... correspondence n 通信；来往 spontaneous a 自愿的；自发的 stable a 稳定的.
自字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 自渎〖 self-abuse;masturbation〗 自发〖 spontaneous〗 自费〖 atone’sownexpense〗.
SAT官方指南OG阅读真题10套 - 豆丁网 ... inept adj. 笨拙的 spontaneous adj. 自然的，无意识的... cheapened adj. 减价.
考博英语词汇 ... sponge n. 海绵；外科用纱布，棉秋 v．用海 spontaneous a. 自发的；自然产生的 spoon n. 匙；调羹；一匙的量.

list.abs: 自然流产(spontaneous abortion)是指妊娠在28 周前自行终止，胎儿体重＜1000g 者。临床上将流产发生在孕12 周前者称为早期流产…
... 麻痹性贝毒,paralytic shellfish poison, 自发极化,spontaneous polarization, --PspPSP压力敏感涂料,Pressure Sensitive Paint.
自发发射(Spontaneous emission),是在没有任何外界作用下,激发态原子或是分子的电子自发地从高能阶向低能阶跃迁,同时发射出一光子。 hv=E_2-E_1  各原子的.
spontaneous nucleation 自发成核spontaneous radiation 自发辐射spontaneous transition 自发跃迁

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin spontaneus (from (sua) sponte 'of (one's) own accord') + -ous

entry.def: Spontaneous acts are not planned or arranged, but are done because someone suddenly wants to do them.

example.ex: Diana's house was crowded with happy people whose spontaneous outbursts of song were accompanied by lively music...
example.tran: 戴安娜的家里挤满了兴奋的人们，他们伴着欢快的音乐不由自主地引吭高歌。

example.ex: I joined in the spontaneous applause.
example.tran: 我跟着也自然而然地鼓起掌来。

entry.tran: 自然的，自发的(指由于内部原因而非外界影响所引起的)
entry.def: A spontaneous event happens because of processes within something rather than being caused by things outside it.

example.ex: I had another spontaneous miscarriage at around the 16th to 18th week.
example.tran: 我在大约第 16 至 18 孕周时又经历了一次自然流产。

means.word_mean: 1. happening or arising without apparent external cause;
2. said or done without having been planned or written in advance;
3. produced without being planted or without human labor;

auth_sentence.content: Her charities were...often spontaneous, though perhaps somewhat scenic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her charities were...often spontaneous, though perhaps somewhat scenic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her charities were...often spontaneous, though perhaps somewhat scenic.

auth_sentence.content: An irreverence which had not been premeditated but spontaneous.
auth_sentence.res_content: An irreverence which had not been premeditated but spontaneous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An irreverence which had not been premeditated but spontaneous.

auth_sentence.content: Mobility problems may also result from these spontaneous bleeds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mobility problems may also result from these spontaneous bleeds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mobility problems may also result from these spontaneous bleeds.

stems_affixes.word_buile: extempore即席的,当场的+aneous多……的,……特征的→即席,当场
miscell=misc混淆+aneous多……的→adj.多种的,混杂的
simult类似+aneous多……的,……特征的→时间相同的
spont=spond+aneous多……的,……特征的→自内心的承诺
despond[v.失望]+ent……的→adj.失望的,意气消沉的
spont=spond承诺,允诺+aneous……的→自内心的承诺

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应
stems_affixes.word_buile: correspond[v.通信;符合]+ence表名词→n.通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被告;回答者;反应; 反射
stems_affixes.word_buile: respond[v.回答,响应,作出反应]+ent……的→回答的人→被告
respond[[v.回答,响应,作出反应]]省鷑.回答,响应,反应
cor共同+respond反应→共同反应→相互通信
de去掉+spond承诺,允诺→不再承诺→失望
re回+spond承诺,允诺→承诺回去→回答

jushi.english: Her successful jump brought a spontaneous cheer from the crowd.
jushi.chinese: 她成功越过横竿后,观众立即发出一阵欢呼声。

jushi.english: The eruption of a volcano is spontaneous.
